mention: My prefix is `{{prefix}}`, if you need help, type it `{{prefix}}help`.

cooldown.message: Command in cooldown, wait **{{time}}** to be able execute this command again.

joined: Hi, I'm {{client}}, just another music focused bot for Discord, thanks for adding me. Well, currently I have just a simple music system and some commands like ping, if you have any questions or If you have any idea what commands you want, go to my support server! Use `{{prefix}}invite`, if you want to know my list of commands, use `{{prefix}}commands`, see you later.
